def.dt: :of, relating to, or situated near the horizon
:parallel to, in the plane of, or operating in a plane parallel to the horizon or to a baseline :level horizontal distance a horizontal engine
:relating to, directed toward, or consisting of individuals or entities of similar status or on the same level horizontal mergers horizontal hostility
:a steel bar supported in a horizontal position approximately eight feet above the floor and used for swinging feats in gymnastics
:an event in gymnastics competition in which the horizontal bar is used
